Package index

Authentication & Configuration

Setup connection to the formr server

formr_api_authenticate()
Authenticate with formr
formr_store_keys()
Store API Credentials in Keyring
formr_api_logout()
Revoke Access Token (Logout)
formr_api_session()
Get Current API session

Project Management & Backup

High-level workflow for syncing and backing up entire projects

formr_pull_project()
Pull Project from Server Scaffolds folder structure if missing, then overwrites local files with Server state.
formr_push_project()
Push Project to Server
formr_backup_run()
Backup a study

Run Management

Operations for Run structures and settings

formr_runs()
List all runs
formr_create_run()
Create a new run
formr_run_settings()
Get or Update Run Settings
formr_run_structure()
Get or Update Run Structure (Run Units)
print(<formr_run_structure>)
Print method for formr run structure
formr_delete_run()
Delete a Run
as.data.frame(<formr_run_structure>)
Convert formr run structure to data.frame

Survey Management

Upload, retrieve, and delete surveys

formr_surveys()
List Surveys
formr_survey_structure()
Get Survey Structure (Items)
formr_upload_survey()
Upload/Update Survey
formr_delete_survey()
Delete a Survey

Session Management

Manage participants and test sessions

formr_sessions()
List Sessions in a Run
formr_create_session()
Create Session(s)
formr_session_action()
Perform Action on Session(s)

File Management

Manage assets and file attachments

formr_files()
List files attached to a run
formr_upload_file()
Upload File(s) to Run
formr_delete_file()
Delete file(s) from a run
formr_delete_all_files()
Delete ALL files attached to a run

Results & Data Processing

Fetch, clean, and aggregate data

formr_results()
Get Run Results
formr_post_process_results()
Process Results Wrapper
formr_recognise()
Recognise data types based on survey metadata
formr_reverse()
Reverse Items
formr_aggregate()
Aggregate Scales
formr_label_missings()
Tag Missing Values (Placeholder)

Item Utilities

Metadata extraction and scale construction

items()
Get item metadata from survey results
item()
Get specific item metadata
aggregate_and_document_scale()
Aggregate variables and document construction
choice_labels_for_values()
Switch choice values with labels
reverse_labelled_values()
Reverse labelled values
rescue_attributes()
Rescue lost attributes

Feedback & Plotting

Visualization and feedback generation

qplot_on_normal()
Plot a normed value on the standard normal
qplot_on_bar()
Plot normed values as a barchart
qplot_on_polar()
Time-polar plot
feedback_chunk()
Text feedback based on groups

Rendering & Markdown

RMarkdown helpers for formr feedback

formr_render()
render text for formr
formr_render_commonmark()
render inline text for formr
formr_inline_render()
render inline text for formr
formr_knit()
knit rmarkdown to markdown for formr
asis_knit_child()
knit_child as is
knit_prefixed()
knit prefixed
markdown_custom_options()
custom markdown options for rmarkdown's pandoc
markdown_github()
github_markdown for rmarkdown
markdown_hard_line_breaks()
hard line breaks
render_text()
render text
word_document()
word_document from rmarkdown, but has an added option not to break on error
paste.knit_asis()
paste.knit_asis
print(<knit_asis>)
Print new lines in knit_asis outputs

Messaging & Notifications

SMS and Email helpers

text_message_twilio()
Send text message via Twilio
text_message_clickatell()
Send text message via Clickatell
text_message_massenversand()
Send text message via Massenversand.de
email_image()
Generate email CID

Time & Logic Utilities

Shorthands for time calculations and common logic

time_passed()
checks how much time has passed relative to the user's last action
next_day()
checks whether a new day has broken (date has increased by at least one day)
in_time_window()
checks whether the current time is in a certain time window
random_date_in_range()
Random date in range
first()
Gives the first non-missing element
last()
Gives the last non-missing element
current()
Gives the last element, doesn't omit missings
finished()
How many surveys were finished?
expired()
How many surveys were expired?
if_na()
Replace NA values with something else
if_na_null()
This function makes sure you know what to expect when evaluating uncertain results in an if-clause. In most cases, you should not use this function, because it can lump a lot of very different cases together, but it may have some use for fool-proofing certain if-clauses on formr.org, where a field in a survey may either not exist, be missing or have a value to check.
ifelsena()
Like ifelse(), but allows you to assign a third value to missings.
`%contains%`
check whether a character string contains another
`%contains_word%`
check whether a character string contains another as a word
`%begins_with%`
check whether a character string begins with a string
`%ends_with%`
check whether a character string ends with a string
get_opencpu_rds()
Get OpenCPU RDS
